proposals.views — Proposal views¶

Proposal module views.

class e_cidadania.apps.proposals.views.ListProposals(ListView)¶

List all proposals stored whithin a space. Inherits from django ListView generic view.

Return type:Object list
Context :proposal
class e_cidadania.apps.proposals.views.ViewProposal(DetailView)¶

Detail view of a proposal. Inherits from django DetailView generic view.

Return type:object
Context :proposal
class e_cidadania.apps.proposals.views.DeleteProposal(DeleteView)¶

Delete a proposal.

Return type:Confirmation
Context :get_place
e_cidadania.apps.proposals.views.add_proposal(request, space_name)¶

Create a new proposal.

Return type:HTML Form
Context :form, get_place
e_cidadania.apps.proposals.views.edit_proposal(request, space_name, prop_id)¶

The proposal can be edited by space and global admins, but also by their creator.

Return type:HTML Form
Context :get_place
